name: Mini Formula Racing: Formula Racing Game For Kids
name_original: Mini Formula Racing: Formula Racing Game For Kids
description:
One of the Most addictive Racing game on AppStore!

Drive on this amazing vehicle on stunning road terrains.

Race against opponents and destroy them,Boost up your speed like no one else can! Fasten your seat belts. Get ready for the drive of your life!

Game Features
- Incredible physics engine that provides realistic-looking vehicle
- Unique ,Easy and smooth gameplay
